definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Will you get me a pair of compasses?
sentences.chinese: 請給我買一副圓規好嗎？

sentences.english: Use your compasses to draw a circle to circle.
sentences.chinese: 用圓規畫圓必須要有圓心。

sentences.english: I bought a pair of compasses in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我在這家商店買了一副圓規。

sentences.english: He can draw a good circle without compasses.
sentences.chinese: 他能不用圓規畫一個非常標準的圓。

sentences.english: Will you get me a pair of compasses?
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一副圓規，就很容易畫一個圓。

sentences.english: The student described a circle with a pare of compasses.
I will need a compass to draw a circle.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個圓規來畫圈。

sentences.english: Compass, protractor, ruler, or any kind of aid.
sentences.chinese: 圓規，量角器，尺子或任何。

sentences.english: Now we begin to draw a circle with compasses.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們開始用圓規畫一個圓。

sentences.english: The teacher asked his students to use their compasses to draw circles .
sentences.chinese: 老師要求學生們用圓規畫圓。

sentences.english: Use your compass to bisect an angle.
sentences.chinese: 用圓規把一個角二等分。

sentences.english: A compass needle points to the north.

definition: to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
